Sentence: Pietro Lombardi (born 9 June 1992) is a German singer and the winner of season 8 of Deutschland sucht den Superstar.
He is best known for his R&B songs and ballads.
Lombardi's songs at Deutschland sucht den Superstar ==
He  married Sarah Engels, the runner-up of his season, on 1 March 2013.
Their son Alessio was born in 2015.
In October 2016, the couple announced their divorce.
Lombardi is now dating Laura Rypa starting in September 2020.
